org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl.fs

Class HadoopFileSystemCacheUtils

extends Object
    File system cache utility methods used by Map-Reduce tasks and jobs.

      • createHadoopLazyConcurrentMap

        public static HadoopLazyConcurrentMap<HadoopFileSystemCacheUtils.FsCacheKey,FileSystem> createHadoopLazyConcurrentMap()
        A common static factory method. Creates new HadoopLazyConcurrentMap.
        Returns:
        a new HadoopLazyConcurrentMap.

      • fileSystemForMrUserWithCaching

        public static FileSystem fileSystemForMrUserWithCaching(@Nullable
                                                        URI uri,
                                                        Configuration cfg,
                                                        HadoopLazyConcurrentMap<HadoopFileSystemCacheUtils.FsCacheKey,FileSystem> map)
                                                 throws IOException
        Common method to get the V1 file system in MapRed engine. It gets the filesystem for the user specified in the configuration with MRJobConfig.USER_NAME property. The file systems are created and cached in the given map upon first request.
        Parameters:
        uri - The file system uri.
        cfg - The configuration.
        map - The caching map.
        Returns:
        The file system.
        Throws:
        IOException - On error.
